name: places/ChIJD5syoxT2wokRdAg90ALiW2I
formattedAddress: 343 W 122nd St, New York, NY 10027, USA
adrFormatAddress: 343 W 122nd St, New York, NY 10027-5101, USA

editorialSummary.text: Classic brownstone inn offering rooms with vintage furnishings, en-suite bathrooms & Wi-Fi.

originalText.text:
Stayed here as we booked late our trip so was one of the few hotels leftover in manhattan.
Location is not great, pretty dangerous for my taste. We tried to never come back later than 9pm due to the area.
Rooms were big and nice, really comfortable mattresses and good laundry services. But bathroom needs some renovation.
We could hear often other guest around in other rooms as well.
Owner or property manager, whoever the lady that checked us in was, seemed fine, nothing bad or good to say about her. Explained us how to move around the area and what to do.
If the price would be lower, I would advise others to say here. At this price, if booked early, there are better locations and hotels in manhattan.

originalText.text: nice little accomodation thats pretty good for the price. we had a very nice room, it was clean and everything worked. wifi was okay too. Location is okay, you can get to downtown manhattan in like 20minutes. No major complaints, I'd come here again.

text.text: nice little accomodation thats pretty good for the price. we had a very nice room, it was clean and everything worked. wifi was okay too. Location is okay, you can get to downtown manhattan in like 20minutes. No major complaints, I'd come here again.

originalText.text: We had such a great experience! The host was incredibly sweet & so helpful when it came to informing us how to get around NYC. Super clean, quiet and the rooms were beautiful! Great location...you can just hop on the A train and get anywhere in the city so that was super convenient! Super safe location, no issues...just with anywhere be aware of your surroundings. Thanks so much for a wonderful stay! We will definitely be back!

text.text: We had such a great experience! The host was incredibly sweet & so helpful when it came to informing us how to get around NYC. Super clean, quiet and the rooms were beautiful! Thanks so much for a wonderful stay! We will definitely be back!

originalText.text: I absolutely will stay here again!!! The Harlem Grand was amazing super cute the place looks exactly like the pictures. The place was clean and organized the host was so lovely and very informative with helping us get around and recommendations for  places to go and check out. the neighborhood was easy to get around and trains close by. Kellyn was a super host next year we are coming back 100%

Kellyn was a super host next year we are coming back 100%

originalText.text: Love this place! The room was even more beautiful than in the pictures and the shower has a mini private sunroof on the top that made taking morning showers so relaxing.  As a born/raised New Yorker who has done a few staycations, this is the place that I will be visiting again!  It is located at a perfect place where not only the local area has so much to do (and eat ðŸ˜Š) but it is also close to the train where I was able to travel super easily around the city. The host, Kellyn, was so helpful and efficient when I had one issue of the WIFI  going slow but it was addressed and fixed within the hour. Seriously, ditch the lifeless hotels and stay at this cultural location for a true New York experience!
